attributes.action: Station Royal Navy warships in the Channel to intercept illegal migrants.
attributes.additional_details: Station multiple Royal Navy warships and helicopters in the English Channel to intercept illegal migrants attempting to enter the UK and to facilitate the return of all such migrants to France.
attributes.background: Current attempts to prevent illegal entry to the UK via boats across the Channel is not effective nor providing deterrence. We call for the stationing of multiple Royal Navy warships and helicopters in the Channel to intercept illegal migrants and facilitate return of all such migrants to France.
